body_html:
@srQ-cpc Have you tested it against the default implementation to check?

For the common case algorithms we should stick to a C++ implementation not only because driving it from Python adds a bit of overhead but also because it means it won't be usable for C++ only programs.

body:
@srQ-cpc Have you tested it against the default implementation to check?

For the common case algorithms we should stick to a C++ implementation not only because driving it from Python adds a bit of overhead but also because it means it won't be usable for C++ only programs.
